### Gross Domestic Product (1990-2017)
```{r}
coube1  <-readr::read_csv("./chapter11data.csv")

```

```{r}
#   produire un graphique linÃ©aire
library(ggplot2)
library(ggthemes)
ggplot(data = coube1, aes(x = year, y = gdp)) +
  geom_line(color = "#55bd34", size = 1) +
  xlab("Years") +
  ylab("Gross domestic product")  +
  theme_minimal() +
  scale_color_brewer(direction = -1)+
  geom_point( color = "#55bd34",size = 2.5)

```
